title: Sorting Hat's Speech
text:
Put me on, don’t be afraid,

I pick up thoughts you never said.

Sit still, don’t freak out, my dear —

I only check out what’s in here.

I work out who you really are,

Brave or clever, bright like a star.

Kind and loyal? Sneaky a bit?

No worries — I will figure it… a hit!

So keep calm, don’t move about,

I’ll sort you out — no doubt!
